programme.title: Evil Lives Here: Shadows Of Death
programme.desc: For six horrifying months, a serial killer prays on the innocent women of Los Angeles. But, with no motive or pattern to go by, detectives struggle to find the perp.

programme.title: Evil Lives Here: Shadows Of Death
programme.desc: In 2019, when a beloved father vanishes, his home appears spotless. However, investigators notice that theres something odd about the flower garden.

programme.title: Murder Comes To Town

programme.desc: When two college students are gunned down while parked in a quiet lovers lane in Juliette, Georgia, the tiny community is beside itself with panic.

programme.desc: Ina has a blast when Stanley Tucci makes martinis to serve with oysters. Plus, Stanley teaches her how to make an incredible Cacciucco stew.

programme.title: Restaurant: Impossible
programme.desc: Robert Irvine heads to California to save a struggling Italian kitchen and market. The fiery owner needs Roberts help to decipher why the restaurant is failing.

programme.title: At Home With Marinka
programme.desc: Chef Marinka prepares a handful of her favourite dishes using a few key ingredients including potato, cheese, beef and pasta.

programme.title: Chopped Junior
programme.desc: The junior chefs battle it out to impress the guest judges. In the dessert round the finalists have to add vegetables to their brownies. Which chef will win?

programme.title: Guys Grocery Games
programme.desc: Chefs who believe they should have won their previous appearance on the show call out their market rivals for a rematch with a prize of $10,000.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins, And Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri dives into dishes steeped in tradition. He checks out Russian piroshki in Seattle, and a hidden joint serving Hawaiian food to a Jewish deli in Chicago.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins, And Dives
programme.desc: Guy Fieri cruises the states to check out Far-Eastern flavours, from chicken with an Asian spin in Seattle and Thai in Hawaii to modern Korean wings in Chicago.

programme.title: Halloween Baking Championship
programme.desc: John Henson challenges the bakers to make upside-down cakes without pineapple and team up to create identical twin cakes that taste different.

programme.title: Haunted Gingerbread Showdown
programme.desc: Three gingerbread artists take on the mummys ancient curse when host Clinton Kelly challenges them to use gingerbread to tell a story of mummies run amok.

programme.title: Chef Grudge Match
programme.desc: Brian Goodman is laying claim to Jonathan Sawyers James Beard Award, and DeUnaka Haley is battling to earn Niema DiGrazias trust.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Actress, and comedian Aisha Tyler and Katie Lee Biegel ply Bobby Flay with cocktails while Jeff Potts and Brittney Williams toast their path to victory.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: The Views Sunny Hostin and Christian Petroni rock Bobby Flay with a Kati roll challenge. Chefs Romain Paumier and Avishar Barua roll up to the kitchen.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: A trendy pastry in the first round inspires debate among the chefs. Plus, the chefs must figure out combine comfort food with a savoury frozen item.

programme.title: Guys Grocery Games
programme.sub-title: City Food Fight: CHI Vs. NYC
programme.desc: Two chef duos celebrate The Big Apple and Chicagos The Bean sculpture in hopes of scoring $15,000 and big city bragging rights.

programme.title: The Kitchen
programme.desc: The cooks teach their top salad recipes. Jeff Mauro makes his blistered tomato and farro shrimp salad, Alex Guarnaschelli gets scientific with a chicken Caesar salad.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins And Dives: Triple...
programme.sub-title: Diners, Drive-Ins And Dives: Triple D Nation. Triple D Nation: Dough
programme.desc: Guy Fieri digs into dynamite doughs with focaccia burgers in Colorado, decadent dulce de leche cookies in San Antonio and a Sicilian pie in Arizona.

programme.title: The Moon Warrior
programme.desc: A benevolent fisherman living a simple life is reluctantly drawn into helping a noble emperor regain his throne from his evil brother.

programme.title: Special Female Force
programme.desc: Fa and five female cadets team up to join a formerly disbanded all-female elite force to hunt down terrorist Gu, the man who killed Fas mother twenty years ago.

programme.title: The Iron Fisted Monk
programme.desc: After learning kung fu from Shaolin, Husker teams up with the Iron Fisted Monk to fight against the Manchus who have killed villagers and raped women.

programme.title: Munitions Hijacking Case
programme.desc: An undercover agent must find and destroy some munitions. He is outnumbered by a group of gangsters after finding them and needs help from a partner to stop a disaster.

programme.title: Unleashed
programme.desc: Fok Kit must win a fight to get his boxing studio back but is defeated and badly hurt instead. Will he win again after witnessing the boxers spirit in his master?

programme.title: 3AM The Campus
programme.desc: A school girl joins a horror video project filmed in an old building near her campus to take revenge on a bullying gang, even at the expense of sacrificing the innocents...

programme.title: The Tigers
programme.desc: Five cops find their careers and their lives in jeopardy when they accept a 10 million dollar bribe from a drug smuggler, to release him from custody during a drug bust.

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: A skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world must return to avenge his lovers death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: Rosa
programme.desc: Two bumbling cops must retrieve a roll of film containing the criminal evidence against a drug cartel from the informants girlfriend, Rosa, to track down the gangsters.

programme.title: Life Without Principle
programme.desc: A criminal, a bank officer and a cop are forced to abandon their morals and principles to solve their financial problems.

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: Two brothers, one a drug lord and the other a police officer, clash in an endless battle between good and evil in a drug cartels turf war.

programme.title: Tiger Cage
programme.desc: A team of police officers uncovers their seniors involvement in an illegal plot after a drug operation raid. They vow to bring them to justice and root out corruption.

programme.title: Fierce Cop
programme.desc: To save his son who has been kidnapped by human traffickers, a police officer teams up with a mysterious lady to crack the crime syndicate and rescue his son.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitans abduct General Yang and set up a deadly trap for his sons. Led by the eldest son, the brothers set out with a band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: Kungfu Stuntmen
programme.desc: The film pays tribute to generations of stuntmen, including current super stars, who designed and delivered some of the most spectacular death-defying kung fu moves on-screen.

programme.title: A World Without Thieves
programme.desc: While con man Bo and femme fatale Li swindle their way across China, Li suddenly decides to leave Bo. However, their encounter with Fu Gen changes their fate forever.

programme.title: Iceman Cometh
programme.desc: While Fang, a Ming royal guard, pursues an evil rapist, they are accidentally frozen. Thawed out to modern-day Hong Kong, Fang continues his pursuit to uphold justice.

programme.title: Lady Reporter
programme.desc: FBI agent Cindy is sent to Hong Kong as an undercover reporter to expose a money forging ring run by a devious newspaper editor, using the newspapers presses.

programme.title: Seven Warriors
programme.desc: Set in 1930s Guangxi, a group of villagers threatened by bandits hires seven warriors to stop the bandits tyranny, and team up to defeat the bandits in the end.

programme.title: Clean My Name, Mr Coroner
programme.desc: An undercover cop framed for murder is forced to take a coroner hostage so as to prove his innocence in the murder of his partner.

programme.title: Bullets Over Summer
programme.desc: Two unorthodox and reckless detectives who use a demented grannys apartment as a stakeout end up developing romantic relationships with her neighbours.

programme.title: Motorway
programme.desc: On the streets of Hong Kong, an arrogant rookie cop and his veteran partner confront a legendary getaway driver, using their cars as weapons in a high stakes showdown.

programme.title: Dragon Tiger Gate
programme.desc: Adapted from a famous Hong Kong comic, three disciples undergo rigorous training to avenge the death of the Dragon Gate Master by defeating the leader of Lousha Clan.

programme.title: 3AM The Office
programme.desc: A newcomer offends the ghosts in his office on his first day at work and experiences spooky encounters during night shifts, making him reflect on his behaviour.

programme.title: Disciples Of Shaolin Temple
programme.desc: A young man evades an arranged marriage to go to Shaolin Temple, where he joins other disciples to fight against an expelled disciple taking revenge on the Abbot.

programme.title: Blind Detective
programme.desc: A blind former detective, who possesses an uncanny ability to solve cold cases for police reward, teams up with a hit team detective in search of her missing friend.

programme.title: Dragon Squad
programme.desc: A veteran cop leads a team of Interpol agents to track down ruthless mercenaries who kidnapped an accused crime lord on his way to court.

programme.title: My Heart is That Eternal Rose
programme.desc: A professional killer reunites with his ex-lover who has become the mistress of a kingpin, leading them into extreme danger.

programme.title: Hidden Heroine
programme.desc: Mei leads the Thunderbolt Womens Commando Unit to defeat the drug cartel in a fierce battle, and successfully rescue her undercover father who has his identity exposed.

programme.title: Tiger Cage III
programme.desc: Two cops investigate the shady dealings of a rich businessman but are set up and assaulted. As they uncover the mastermind behind, the final showdown becomes inevitable.

programme.title: The Lost Bladesman
programme.desc: Guan Yu is held hostage by Cao, the enemy of his sworn brother Liu, and must fight for Cao. He has to fight a dangerous battle before he can rescue Lius concubine from Cao.

programme.title: The Hidden Enforcers
programme.desc: A retired police officer trains four assassins to punish wrongdoers who escaped from conviction. However, his good intention turns sour when the assassins kill the cops.

programme.title: Widow Warriors
programme.desc: When the men in a triad family are betrayed and gunned down by a rival gang, their wives decide to take revenge for the death of their husbands.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Sport meets romance in this Tom Cruise rom-com that showed us the money! A successful sports agent who loses everything is determined to get back what he once had.

programme.title: The Flood
programme.desc: A compelling survival thriller. When a horde of giant, hungry alligators infests a Louisiana police station during a massive hurricane, prisoners and guards must fight for their lives.

programme.title: The Boy
programme.desc: An intimate portrait of a 9-year-old sociopaths growing fascination with death.

programme.title: The First Noelle
programme.desc: An ambitious young book editor named Noelle attempts to win back her ex after he returns home for Christmas with a new girlfriend, who also happens to be named Noelle.

programme.title: The Ex Obsession
programme.desc: An accidental death leads to stolen identity when a woman coerces her husband to assume her dead exs identity. Their desperate cover-up spirals into obsession.

programme.title: The Holiday Dating Guide
programme.desc: A delightful holiday romcom. To satisfy her publisher, a dating coach must prove her advice works by making a man fall for her by Christmas Eve in 12 days.

programme.title: The Nutcracker And The Magic Flute
programme.desc: The classic Nutcracker tale gets a refreshing twist. As Marie wishes to escape her troubles, she shrinks to the size of her toys, which all come to life.

programme.title: Aliens Abducted My Parents And Now...
programme.sub-title: Aliens Abducted My Parents And Now I Feel Kinda Left Out
programme.desc: A sci-fi comedy. A teen girl helps her space-obsessed neighbour to find his parents, whom aliens might have abducted.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda 2
programme.desc: When the murderous Lord Shen threatens China with a terrifying new weapon, Po must face a truth he never expected and defeat Shen for the good of Kung Fu.

programme.title: The Fast And The Furious
programme.desc: Vin Diesel and the late Paul Walker team up for the first instalment of the popular franchise, which sees a cop go undercover to infiltrate a racing crew.

programme.title: 2 Fast 2 Furious
programme.desc: Paul Walker and Tyrese Gibson join forces to bring a Miami drug lord to justice in the first sequel to the Hollywood thrill ride. Expect hot cars and plenty of action.

programme.title: Assassin
programme.desc: South African star Nomzamo Mbatha stars alongside Bruce Willis in this sci-fi action thriller. A widow takes on a mission to bring the man responsible for her husbands death to justice.

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: Dwayne Johnson leads this larger-than-life monster movie. After animals are infected by a dangerous pathogen, a primatologist and a geneticist team up to stop their deadly rampage.

programme.title: The Ice Road
programme.desc: Liam Neeson leads this riveting film about a diamond mine that collapses in Canada. A big-rig road driver leads a rescue mission over a frozen lake to save some trapped miners.

programme.title: The Protege
programme.desc: Maggie Q leads this all-star cast in this action movie. When the mentor of the worlds best contract killer is killed, she vows to avenge the man who taught her everything.

programme.title: The Unbearable Weight Of Massive...
programme.sub-title: The Unbearable Weight Of Massive Talent
programme.desc: An action comedy starring Nicolas Cage as a fictional version of himself. He channels his on-screen characters to save himself and his loved ones.

programme.title: Deadly DILF
programme.desc: A compelling thriller. A harmless flirtation between a college girl and the hot dad next door turns deadly when she becomes obsessed with him and tries to destroy his marriage.

programme.title: Shamed
programme.desc: A delightful romcom. A magazine editor goes on an island trip to clear her mind and focus on her infamous Shamed List column, only to fall for one of the men on her List.

programme.title: Christmas Couples Retreat
programme.desc: An enjoyable Christmas movie that follows three couples who attend a retreat hoping to strengthen their respective relationships with the help of a relationship guru.

programme.title: A Royal Surprise
programme.desc: Thapelo Mokoena and Jennifer Freeman are the heartbeats of this film. After Riley learns Mandla is a prince while visiting his family, he must try to regain her trust and love.

programme.title: My Sweet Monster
programme.desc: An animated musical for the family. Princess Barbara flees her wedding and meets a sweet monster and his pal, who help save her kingdom from an evil postman.

programme.title: The Barkers: Mind The Cats!
programme.desc: An adventure-filled animation. While on holiday with his dog family, Kid is eager to play with his siblings, but they are too busy. Luckily, Kid finds new friends: Cats.

programme.title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic...
programme.sub-title: Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie
programme.desc: Kevin Hart lends his voice to this colourful superhero animation. Two pranksters hypnotise their principal into believing hes a superhero.

programme.title: Nanny Mcphee And The Big Bang
programme.desc: Oscar winner Emma Thompson writes and stars in this fun family film. A mysterious nanny arrives to help a struggling mom with her kids and the farm while their father is at war.

programme.title: The Fast And The Furious: Tokyo Drift
programme.desc: Justin Lin adds a new flavour to this thrilling franchise. A troubled teen is sent to live with his dad in Tokyo, there, he learns about a new type of racing.

programme.title: Fast and Furious
programme.desc: Vin Diesel and Paul Walker return for an explosive crime movie driven by nitro and betrayal. The crew tries to take down a drug lord - with devastating consequences.

programme.title: Proud Mary
programme.desc: Taraji P. Henson is an unstoppable assassin in this action-packed movie. The life of a successful hitwoman is changed forever when she encounters a young boy during a botched job.

programme.title: Shaft
programme.desc: Oscar nominated actor, Samuel L. Jackson plays the legendary 1970s character in this action thriller. Shaft makes it his personal mission to bring a murderer to justice.

programme.title: Fear The Night
programme.desc: Maggie Q drives this action thriller. An Iraqi war veteran prepares to strike back after a group of home invaders attack during her sisters bachelorette party.

programme.title: Zone 414
programme.desc: Guy Pearce drives this sci-fi thriller as a private investigator tasked with finding a tech billionaires missing daughter. He teams up with an advanced AI to solve the mystery.

programme.title: Dead Trigger: Unkilled
programme.desc: A post-apocalyptic film that sees an elite soldier unit stepping in to save humanity when a virus decimates the world and creates zombie hordes.

programme.title: Sharknado 5: Global Swarming
programme.desc: With much of America lying in ruins, the rest of the world braces for a global sharknado, and Fin and his family must travel around the world to stop them.

programme.title: The Punisher
programme.desc: After his wife and family are killed, G Man Frank Castle takes it upon himself to rid America of crime by acting as judge, jury and executioner.

programme.title: Punisher: War Zone
programme.desc: After hunting down and killing hundreds of violent criminals, Frank Castle, aka The Punisher, faces his most deadly foe yet: Jigsaw.

programme.title: Jamie Foxx: Secret To Success
programme.desc: A comprehensive look at the life and career of veteran actor Jamie Foxx. From starting out in comedy to Oscar wins and nominations, Foxxs career has been nothing short of success.

programme.title: Did You Hear About The Morgans?
programme.desc: An estranged New York couple witnesses a murder and are placed in a witness-protection program in a small Wyoming town.

programme.title: The Real Angelina
programme.desc: Angelina Jolie, the admirable Oscar-winning actress turned director and humanitarian. The legendary Hollywood femme fatale and actress, known for her sex appeal and edginess.

programme.title: The Help
programme.desc: In 1960s Mississippi, Southern society girl Skeeter turns her small town on its ear when she interviews the black women who have spent their lives taking care of prominent white families.

programme.title: Enough Said
programme.desc: A divorced masseuse starts dating a sweet but somewhat clueless man with whom she shares a fun rapport, only to discover that hes her new friends ex-husband.

programme.title: Titanic
programme.desc: Leonardo DiCaprio and Kate Winslet light up the screen in this unforgettable tale of forbidden love and courage set against the ill-fated maiden voyage of the unsinkable Titanic.

programme.title: Sweet Home Alabama
programme.desc: New York clothing designer gets engaged to the citys most eligible bachelor, but when home tugs at her heartstrings she is forced to decide what she really wants after all.

programme.title: Late Night
programme.desc: Emma Thompson plays Katherine Newbury, who is a legendary late-night talk show host, whose world is turned upside down when she hires her only female staff writer played by Kaling.

programme.title: Life As We Know It
programme.desc: Holly and Eric. After a disastrous first date, the only thing they have in common is their dislike for each other and their love for their goddaughter, Sophie.

programme.title: Bloodshot
programme.desc: An ex-killer for the mob, is kidnapped and injected with microscopic computers called nanites. They erase his brain and rebuild it for his body to be a weapon with superhuman strength.

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: Revolves around a former secret agent who offers his investigative services in order to atone for his past sins. Based on the TV series by the same name.

programme.title: The Equalizer 2
programme.desc: Denzel Washington returns as Robert McCall, serving an unflinching justice for the exploited and oppressed - but this time its personal.

programme.title: John Q
programme.desc: John Q takes an unwitting group of people hostage in the hospital emergency room and now he and many others need medical care.

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being Jack Napier, a criminal who becomes the clownishly homicidal Joker.

programme.title: How Do You Know
programme.desc: How Do You Know, the new comedy written and directed by James L. Brooks that takes a contemporary and romantic look at the question, How do you know?

programme.title: My Super Ex-Girlfriend
programme.desc: My Super Ex-Girlfriend follows Matt Saunders, a run-of-the-mill guy who dumps his long-time girlfriend, only to discover that shes actually a superhero and is now out for revenge.

programme.title: Holy Man
programme.desc: Eddie Murphy stars as an over-the-top television evangelist who finds a way to turn television home shopping into a religious experience, and takes America by storm.

programme.title: Bad Company
programme.desc: Veteran CIA agent Gaylord Oakes must recruit streetwise punk Jake Hayes (Rock) when Jakes identical twin brother is killed in the line of duty.

programme.title: The Man From U.N.C.L.E.
programme.desc: Henry Cavill and Armie Hammer star as rival CIA and KGB agents who are forced to put aside longstanding hostilities and team up on a joint mission to stop a mysterious criminal organization.

programme.title: Red
programme.desc: When his peaceful life is threatened by a high-tech assassin, former black-ops agent Frank Moses reassembles his old team in a last-ditch effort to survive and uncover the assailants.

programme.title: Red 2
programme.desc: Retired CIA agent Frank Moses reunites his unlikely team of elite operatives for a global quest to track down a missing portable nuclear device.

programme.title: Infinite
programme.desc: A man discovers that his hallucinations are actually visions from past lives.

programme.title: 30 Minutes Or Less
programme.desc: The tale of three slacker friends and the adventures that ensure after one of them inadvertently robs a bank armed only with a large salami.

programme.title: Get Him To The Greek
programme.desc: A record company intern is hired to accompany out-of-control British rock star Aldous Snow to a concert at L.A.s Greek Theater.

programme.title: Miss Bala
programme.desc: Gloria finds a power she never knew she had when she is drawn into a dangerous world of cross-border crime. Surviving will require all of her cunning and strength.

programme.title: Heath Ledger: A Tragic Tale
programme.desc: The tragedy of Heath Ledgers death has led to endless rumours and speculation about depression, hard-partying, and madness brought on by his role in the Dark Knight.
